item.title: Sneak peek: Coached to Kill

item.title: New Year's Eve celebrations kick off as 2026 arrives Down Under
item.description: New Zealand and Australia were the first to welcome 2026, but in Sydney and some other cities, the festivities are tinged by grief.

item.title: 5 key questions for the U.S. economy in 2026
item.description: From stubbornly high living costs to a softer labor market, economists say these are the forces that will shape the year ahead.

item.title: What's the home equity rate forecast for January 2025?
item.description: If you're planning to borrow from your home's equity, it's important to know what could be coming for rates soon.

item.title: Photos show the year in politics for 2025
item.description: In 2025, President Trump returned to power and instituted change in Washington. Here's a roundup of photos of key moments throughout the year.
